Overview

This package contains the RIM KeyStore API.

The KeyStore API

See:
          Description

Class Summary
KeyStoreDataMap This class implements the functionality of adding hashes to the key store according to the developers desires for what would be considered as the index or hash of the key store data.
 

Package net.rim.device.api.crypto.keystore Description

Keystore Classes and Definitions

This package contains information relating to the keystore classes that can be extended by developers. For more information, see Notes on implementing your own keystore. This tutorial provides helpful hints and describes the steps involved in implementing your own keystore.
